title: Need 3 RP :D
body:
I can't draw, and need three RP :3

ty

replies.body:
Hey there,

Wow such beautiful artwork *sheds tear*, unfortunately you probably won't get your RP from a boards post.

You'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support, remember that this is a one time deal so if you need RP again you won't be able to make the same request.
